elements.text: You are in a research study that requires multiple visits. You finish some of the exams with the research coordinator, and you feel that you aren't doing as well as you usually do. When the principal investigator comes in, they tell you that your participation is...

elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
